scripts.test: cd test && npm install && npm install .. && grunt --debug
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:pre && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:post && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:pre && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:post && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:pre && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:post && npm publish
